com.intel.util.provider.sqlite

Class AbstractSqliteOpenHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.intel.util.provider.sqlite.AbstractSqliteOpenHelper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StorageSqliteOpenHelper

    @ThreadSafe
public abstract class AbstractSqliteOpenHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    This class offers improved SQLite database initialization.

    Specifically, this class will enable foreign key support in SQLite, automatically vacuum databases after upgrades, and provides some additional facilities for interacting with the database.

      • dropTableIfExists

        @Slow(value=MILLISECONDS)
protected static final void dropTableIfExists(@NonNull
                                                                        android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                                                                        @NonNull
                                                                        java.lang.String tableName)
        Helper method to drop tables.

        This is most useful during database upgrades or downgrades.

        Parameters:
        db - Database to mutate.
        tableName - Name of the table to attempt to drop.
